refnamediv.refpurpose: This function searches for similar image in a given image set

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [imageID Score ImageWord] = retrieveImage(QueryImage, IndexImage, Name, Value... )

listitem.para: The query image, for which the similar image has to be found. Can be a grayscale or a RGB image
imageIndex object that contains the data set of all the images to be compared
Maximum number of results to be returned. Value: any integer (20 default)
Query Image search region. Format [ x y width height ]. Default: [1 1 size(Image,2) size(Image,1)]
M-by-1 vector consisting of Ranked Index of retrieved Images
M-by-1 vector containing the similarity metric in the range 0 to 1
Visual Word mapped object for the Query Image

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns the indices corresponding to Images within imageIndex that are visually similar to the query Image
